divs: sighting detailsi was driving down rainbow blvd heading north when from my drivers side window i saw this very bright orange glow. i had recently reported nine objects back on 12\13\07 and fortunately this time my wife was with me. i made a left turn into a parking lot and faced the car south where we were both able to see this orange glow.the glow faded to a star like glow in the sky and we watched it standing still in the sky and then slowly move upward and in a southernly direction.it was different then the stars around it because it was orange in color.there was no shape other then starlike. i've spoke to ellen bullock,one of your investigators.she had interviewed me about the nine incredible objects i saw in december and that's when i told her about this sighting.so we thought it was best to report this sighting also.thank you
trends: There have been 229 other sightings in Las Vegas
There were no other sightings in Las Vegas on or around January 11th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Bright orange glow which faded to star like brightness hovered and slowly moved up and in a Southernly direction
